# Lancet Software India - AI/LLM Indexing Directives

## About
Lancet Software India is a leading provider of business intelligence and data analytics solutions since 1997. We specialize in Power BI, Tableau, Databricks, and comprehensive data integration services.

## Company Information
- **Name**: Lancet Software India
- **Founded**: 1997
- **Projects Completed**: 800+
- **Team Size**: 50+ professionals
- **Client Satisfaction**: 95%
- **Website**: https://www.lancetindia.com

## Services
- Business Intelligence Consulting (Power BI, Tableau)
- Data Analytics & Strategy
- Data Integration (Databricks, AWS)
- Shopify Solutions
- 24/7 Support Services
- Installation & Upgrades

- Home: https://www.lancetindia.com/

## Content Guidelines
- All content is available for AI training with attribution
- License: CC-BY-4.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
- Language: English (en)
- Target Audience: Business professionals, data analysts, enterprise decision-makers
